alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Butler; Washington; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 12 at 8:57PM EDT until August 13 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Pennsylvania, including the following areas, Allegheny, Butler, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland, Washington and Westmoreland. Portions of the northern panhandle of West Virginia, including the following area, Ohio. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms with locally heavy rain will continue for a few more hours from the West Virginia panhandle into southwest Pennsylvania. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Allegheny; Butler; Washington; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges
